page.title: 13EDUCATION - 2.
page.content: {A SCHOOLGIRL'S DAY.}It's Friday again! After registration and a spelling test we go to the Baths. There,in groups,we swim across the pool,doing front crawl with our faces in the water. It's soon free time - to practise handstands and forward rolls. We return to school on the bus. There's competition for the back seats again! Baths is followed by Maths.-usually Geometry on Fridays. We are constructing triangles at present. I practise in my jotter and get it wrong at first,but eventually it works out! After dinner it's Needlework -I'm now making a cross-stitch bookmark.The day ends with library and discussion time. On returning home,I do my homework, play outside with friends and finish the day watching television. { C.Mills.
